quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根“con-”（一起）+“fabula”（故事）联想，将“confabulate”误解为“交谈”或“讨论”（忽略其“编造虚假内容”的核心义）
quiz_item.sentence: After the accident, the patient would often **confabulate** details about his childhood that never actually happened, as his brain tried to fill in gaps in his memory.
